On January 10, data from the People‚Äôs Bank of China shows that by the end of December in 2021, bonds in China‚Äôs interbank market held by overseas institutions totaled 4 trillion yuan, which is 750 billion higher than the figure registered at the end of December in 2020.

It is preposterous for the US, a country with a deplorable track record‚ÄÇof‚ÄÇhuman‚ÄÇrights‚ÄÇissues, to accuse and smear China. The US has serious problems of human trafficking and forced labor.

#BeijingOlympicProfile ‚Äì If there was ever a lead contender for Winter Olympic GOAT it‚Äôs Mika√´l Kingsbury @MikaelKingsbury. The Canadian freestyle skier is 2018 Olympic Gold Medallist / Record holder for most World Cup Wins / 4x World Champion / 2014 Medalist.
@TeamCanada https://t.co/vayz69sIrB

#BeijingOlympicProfile ‚Äì the now 17-year-old Su Yiming @mingsuyi is attracting the world‚Äôs attention, becoming the first Chinese male snowboarder to finish Cab 1800 (a switch frontside 1800 degrees), known as one of the most difficult snowboarding tricks.

@Beijing2022 #Olympics https://t.co/JmWF7k9mHO

#BeijingOlympicProfile ‚Äì Chinese-American freestyle skiing sensation Eileen Gu will represent #China at the Beijing Games. She made history as the first-ever female rookie to win 3 medals - gold in both Ski Slopestyle, Superpipe, and bronze in Ski Big Air. @Beijing2022 #Olympics https://t.co/wgavwYRvco

#BeijingOlympicProfile - Ivanie Blondin, from the Gloucester Concordes @GCSSClub, is a top Canadian speed skater and medal hopeful in Beijing. She primarily skates long distances of 3000 m, 5000 m, and the mass start event. @TeamCanada @Beijing2022 #Olympics https://t.co/uIeXVG0WaU

#BeijingOlympicProfile - Laurent Dubreuil is a Canadian speed skater. He competes in the short distances of 500 m and 1000 m. He won his first World Cup medal in 2014. He also won a bronze medal at the 2015 World Single Distance Championships. @TeamCanada @Beijing2022 #Olympics https://t.co/oh7fOY9xNX

#BeijingOlympicProfile ‚Äì Arabella Ng is a Hong Kong based Giant Slalom skier. Ng became the first athlete from the city to compete on snow at the Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang. She finished 63rd at those Games.  She has high hopes for @Beijing2022 #Olympics https://t.co/7rwaIBHS4D

#BeijingOlympicProfile ‚Äì Han Cong and Sui Wenjing are Chinese pairs figure skaters. They are the 2018 Olympic silver medalists, a two-time world champions, a three-time world silver medalists.
@Beijing2022 #Olympics https://t.co/5ikhkpBtwn

#BeijingOlympicProfile ‚Äì Ted-Jan Bloemen @tedjanb is a Dutch-Canadian long track speed skater. He started competing for the Canadian national speed skating team during the 2014‚Äì15 season. Prior he competed for Netherlands.
@TeamCanada @Beijing2022 #Olympics https://t.co/Hx71bLkkiz
